data.text:
Enjoy green season with Nok Air!  
📌 Nok Lite starts at 990 THB
📌 Nok X-tra starts at 1,190 THB with 15 kg checked baggage
📱 Book now 16-30 September 2020
✈ Travel 17 September – 30 October 20 #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/9ev4V0equh

Whether it is booking a flight or advanced check-in, you can do it so easily in Nok Air App. An application provides a convenient experience you'll get when flying with us. Wait no more download it now https://t.co/zSniApoJwj #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/CHxhFkObiS

Ratchaprapa Dam, Surat Thani, is one of the most magnificent attractions. This so-called Thailand's Guilin owns surrounding mountains and the emerald-like water that will take you into another world. Book Fly 'n' Ride for your visit at https://t.co/zSniApoJwj #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/Pn79VzCoLW

Nok Air provides even more convenience for travel lovers with Nok Air Application. You can book, check-in, and manage your flight with just a few taps on your mobile. Save you valuable time by download now! Available for both iOS and Android. #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/5nikQwAF1T

data.text:
9.9 Fly festival with Nok Air! https://t.co/iSCI0vNsYI
📌Nok Lite starts at 640 THB
📌Nok X-tra starts at 840 THB with 20 kg checked baggage
📱 Book now 2-11 Sep 2019
✈ Travel 9 Sep 2019 - 28 Mar 2020
⭐ No fee QR code payment 
⭐ 3-month interest installment plan #NokAir https://t.co/RZHmP2RNIj

Let's fly and fun with Nok Air! https://t.co/9HDikT0JYX 
📌Nok Lite starts at 650 THB
📌Nok X-tra starts at 850 THB with 20 kg checked baggage
📱 Book now 26 Aug - 1 Sep 2019
✈ Travel 2 Sep 2019 - 28 Mar 2020
⭐ No fee QR code payment 
⭐ 3-month interest installment plan https://t.co/vQJhyTCxd2

Nok Air connects people from Phuket to Bangkok, Chiang Mai, and Ubon Ratchathani in one booking, together with a check-through service. Reach your destination seamlessly. Get yours now on https://t.co/zSniApGkUT #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/bIXt1tfHZp

Let’s fly to New Delhi and visit landmarks such as Red Fort, Rashtrapati Bhavan, Lotus Temple, and more. Nok Air teams up with Nok Scoot to offer seamless flights from Thailand, together with a check-through service. Book now on https://t.co/zSniApGkUT. #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/4sk8jVO4M4

Though you are in Chiang Mai, and your destination are Surat Thani or Phuket, you still can manage your flight just in one booking. Easy, isn't it? Come grab this convenience at https://t.co/zSniApGkUT #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/y5s91KhLSd

Phu Soi Dao is the most famous destination for watching a night sky. Its remote location allows no neon lights from the city, so you can appreciate millions of stars with your naked eyes. Start your trip with Nok Air now on https://t.co/zSniApGkUT #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/SYaAspvwZG

Get a flight from Nok Air team up in Value Alliance to visit Osaka. One site you must visit is Temposan Ferris Wheel, located on Osaka bay's side. Take a great view from this spot, especially when the sunset. Get a flight now at https://t.co/zSniApGkUT #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/0Rg7ZdrlrS

Tan Dinh Church is one attraction you shouldn't miss in HCMC. The church owns a uniqueness that can be seen nowhere else cause it is all in pink. Book a flight to Vietnam and spot this by your sight https://t.co/zSniApGkUT #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/JSjIhGj0OD

Let's go travel with Nok Air with worry-free. Book a flight you want, and if the price is from 3,000 baht per sales slip, you can pay it with 0% installment for 3 months. Pick a destination and book a flight with us https://t.co/zSniApoJwj #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/a9uDbxbxp8

Thung Salaeng Luang Nation Park is a grassland terrain with mountainous ranges endowed with wildflowers and pine trees. Those natural features are in full bloom during the rainy season like this. Start your trip with Nok Air now on https://t.co/zSniApoJwj #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/NcCJWVTpaa

Nok Air makes traveling across regions more comfortable with routes from Chiang Mai to Phuket, Krabi, Surat Thani, and Nakhon Si Thammarat. Enjoy a seamless flight with a check-through service in every booking. Start your trip now on https://t.co/zSniApoJwj #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/OgueyNW31u

Staying in Chaing Mai and you can travel directly to Udon Thani. Cause Nok Air provide you a flight you can find nowhere else. Book Chiang Mai - Udon Thani in any style you want. Go grab it now at https://t.co/zSniApoJwj #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/6Lp3xVe2Wg

It's rainy season right now, so you must visit Phu Hin Rong Kla National Park, Phitsanulok. It will be only this time of the year that Dok Pro Phu Khao blooms. Grab a direct flight to Phitsanulok now at https://t.co/zSniApGkUT #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/OZskRLNDBW

Lampang isn't adorable only in cool season, the rain also makes the province even more attractive in this green season. Many interesting sites are waiting for you, book a flight to Lampang with Nok Air now at https://t.co/zSniApGkUT #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/Q1bnKxFAaz

data.text: Nok Air connect Thailand’s two largest regions closer with Chiang Mai - Ubon Ratchathani route. You can fly direct from the North to the Northeast. Spend less time traveling and more time playing! Book now on https://t.co/zSniApGkUT https://t.co/zMDS7uIf5D

Good news for people in Chiang Mai! You can fly to various domestic and international destinations with Nok Air today. We also have direct routes and routes with a check-through service. Start your trip now on https://t.co/zSniApoJwj #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/YcuQOsuAYC

If you have a trip to Loei in this May, we suggest you to visit Wat Neramit Wipatsana. This is the only place in Thailand where chedi and main hall are constructed by laterite bricks. Book a direct flight to Loei with Nok Air at https://t.co/zSniApoJwj #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/ip2R08YhsT

Thunderbird Sale! Super special offers, lowest fares start from 550 THB. Click https://t.co/kmIyYfwZV4 Book by 31 May 2019 and travel by 28 Mar 20. No fee for QR payment #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/yP8pvPA5vp

Buu Long Pagoda, known as "Thai Temple" by locals, is a masterpiece where you will see many influences from several Southeast Asian countries in one architecture. Get a direct flight to Ho Chi Minh city with Nok Air on https://t.co/zSniApGkUT #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/3nhnBVnsdX

Fly to the Gulf of Thailand with Nok Air to complete this summer. Put on your swimsuits and go snorkel in clear waters and recharge your energy by relaxing on the beach. Plan your next vacation and book Nok air Fly 'n' Ferry service https://t.co/zSniApGkUT #NokAir #WeFlySmiles https://t.co/IhPKIkkZuq
